mapper.select: SELECT album_no, album_title, album_content, to_char(album_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd day hh24:mi:ss') AS album_date FROM album ORDER BY album_no DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT album_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO album ( album_no, album_title, album_content, album_date ) VALUES ( #{ albumNo }, #{ albumTitle }, #{ albumContent }, sysdate )
INSERT INTO album_file ( album_file_no, album_no, album_origin_name, album_stored_name ) VALUES ( album_file_seq.nextval, #{ albumNo }, #{ albumOriginName }, #{ albumStoredName } )
